Articles.Content:
I can play KSP properly without Lazor, but when I add it things don't work. Specifically when I go to the launch pad I see all the window decorations (navball, engineer displays, etc) but no scene. Then when I switch back to the space center all I see is the background display.

I've probably done something wrong, does anyone know what it might be?

I can play KSP properly without Lazor, but when I add it things don't work. Specifically when I go to the launch pad I see all the window decorations (navball, engineer displays, etc) but no scene. Then when I switch back to the space center all I see is the background display.

I've probably done something wrong, does anyone know what it might be?

It don't work in 1.04

EDIT- For docking cam try http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130258-Docking-Target-%280-1%29-July-30-2015

Edited August 6, 2015 by Mecripp2
